original: 1 3 1 0301a ā va indra kṛviṃ yathā vājayantaḥ śatakratum .

R atas cit indra naḥ upa ā yāhi śata vājayā
rocayan sahasra vājayā

original: 1 3 1 0303a ā bundaṃ vṛtrahā dade jātaḥ pṛcchadvi mātaram .

ke ugrāḥ ke ha śṛṇvire

original: 1 3 1 0305a ṛjunītī no varuṇo mitro nayati vidvān .

ā naḥ mitrāvaruṇā ghṛtaiḥ gavyūtim ukṣatam

original: 1 3 1 0405a ā yāhyupa naḥ sutaṃ vājebhirmā hṛṇīyathāḥ .

analyzed: vayam gha te api smasi stotāraḥ indra girvaṇaḥ

original: 1 3 1 0409a endra pṛkṣu kāsu cinnṛmṇaṃ tanūṣu dhehi naḥ .

original: 1 3 1 0504c abhi vatsaṃ na svasareṣu dhenava indraṃ gīrbhirnavāmahe .. 236

original: 1 3 1 0506c ā va indraṃ puruhūtaṃ name girā nemiṃ taṣṭeva sudruvam .. 238

original: 1 3 2 0603a ā tvā sahasramā śataṃ yuktā rathe hiraṇyaye .

original: 1 3 2 0603c brahmayujo haraya indra keśino vahantu somapītaye .. 245

analyzed: tām ā madāya vajrahasta pītaye haribhyām yāhi oke ā

original: 1 4 1 0102a ima indra madāya te somāścikitra ukithanaḥ .
analyzed: ime indra madāya te somāḥ cikitre ukithanaḥ

original: 1 4 1 0102c madhoḥ papāna upa no giraḥ śṛṇu rāsva stotrāya girvaṇaḥ .. 294
analyzed: madhoḥ papānaḥ upa naḥ giraḥ śṛṇu rāsva stotrāya girvaṇaḥ
ā sabardughām huve gāyatra vepasam
indram dhenum sudughām anya āmiṣam uru dhārām araṃkṛtam  /

original: 1 4 1 0104a na tvā bṛhanto adrayo varanta indra vīḍavaḥ .
analyzed: na tvā bṛhantaḥ adrayaḥ varante indra vīḍavaḥ

original: 1 4 1 0104c yacchikṣasi stuvate māvate vasu na kiṣṭadā mināti te .. 296
analyzed: yat śikṣasi stuvate māvate vasu na kiṣṭadā mināti te  /

original: 1 4 1 0105a ka īṃ veda sute sacā pibantaṃ kadvayo dadhe .
analyzed: kaḥ īm veda sute sacā pibantam ka dvayaḥ dadhe

original: 1 4 1 0105c ayaṃ yaḥ puro vibhinatyojasā mandānaḥ śipryandhasaḥ .. 297
analyzed: ayam yaḥ puras vibhinati ojasā mandānaḥ śipri andhasaḥ  /
yat indra śāsaḥ avratam cyāvaya sadasaḥ pari
asmākam aṃśum maghavan puruspṛham vasavye adhi barhaya  /

original: 1 4 1 0107a tvaṣṭā no daivyaṃ vacaḥ parjanyo brahmaṇaspatiḥ .
analyzed: tvaṣṭā naḥ daivyam vacaḥ parjanyaḥ brahmaṇaspatiḥ

original: 1 4 1 0107c putrairbhrātṛbhiraditirnu pātu no duṣṭaraṃ trāmaṇaṃ vacaḥ .. 299
analyzed: putraiḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ aditiḥ nu pātu naḥ duṣṭaram trāmaṇam vacaḥ  /

original: 1 4 1 0108a kadā ca na starīrasi nendra saścasi dāśuṣe .
analyzed: kadā ca na starīrasi na indra saścasi dāśuṣe

original: 1 4 1 0108c upopennu maghavanbhūya innu te dānaṃ devasya pṛcyate .. 300
analyzed: upa upa id nu maghavan bhūyaḥ id nu te dānam devasya pṛcyate  /

original: 1 4 1 0109a yuṅkṣvā hi vṛtrahantama harī indra parāvataḥ .
analyzed: yuṅkṣva hi vṛtra hantama harī indra parāvataḥ
arvācīnaḥ maghavan soma pītaye ugraḥ ṛṣvebhiḥ ā gahi  /

original: 1 4 1 0110c sa indra stomavāhasa iha śrudhyupa svasaramā gahi .. 302
analyzed: saḥ indra stoma vāhasaḥ iha śrudhi upa svasaramā gahi  /

original: 1 4 1 0201c apo mahī vṛṇute cakṣuṣā tamo jyotiṣkṛṇoti sūnari .. 303
analyzed: apaḥ mahī vṛṇute cakṣuṣā tamaḥ jyotiṣkṛṇoti sūnare

original: 1 4 1 0202a imā u vāṃ diviṣṭaya usrā havante aśvinā .
analyzed: imāḥ u vām diviṣṭayaḥ usrā havante aśvinā

original: 1 4 1 0202c ayaṃ vāmahve 'vase śacīvasū viśaṃviśaṃ hi gacchathaḥ .. 304
analyzed: ayam vām ahve vase śacī vasū viśam viśam hi gacchathaḥ  /

original: 1 4 1 0203a ku ṣṭhaḥ ko vāmaśvinā tapāno devā martyaḥ .
analyzed: ku kaḥ vām aśvinā tapānaḥ devāḥ martyaḥ

original: 1 4 1 0204a ayaṃ vāṃ madhumattamaḥ sutaḥ somo diviṣṭiṣu .
analyzed: ayam vām madhumattamaḥ sutaḥ somaḥ diviṣṭiṣu

original: 1 4 1 0204c tamaśvinā pibataṃ tiro ahnyaṃ dhattaṃ ratnāni dāśuṣe .. 306
analyzed: tam aśvinā pibatam tiras ahnyam dhattam ratnāni dāśuṣe

original: 1 4 1 0205a ā tvā somasya galdayā sadā yācannahaṃ jyā .
analyzed: ā tvā somasya galdayā sadā yācan aham jyā

original: 1 4 1 0205c bhūrṇiṃ mṛgaṃ na savaneṣu cukrudhaṃ ka īśānaṃ na yāciṣat .. 307
analyzed: bhūrṇim mṛgam na savaneṣu cukrudham kaḥ īśānam na yāciṣat  /

original: 1 4 1 0206c upo nūnaṃ yuyuje vṛṣṇā harī ā ca jagāma vṛtrahā .. 308
analyzed: upa u nūnam yuyuje vṛṣṇā harī ā ca jagāma vṛtrahā  /
abhi sataḥ tadā bhara indra jyāyaḥ kanīyasaḥ
purūvasuḥ hi maghavan babhūvitha bharebhare ca havyaḥ
yat indra yāvataḥ tvam etāvat aham īśīya
stotāram id dadhiṣe radāvaso na pāpatvāya raṃsiṣam  /
tvam indra pratūrtiṣu abhi viśvāḥ asi spṛdhaḥ

original: 1 4 1 0209c aśastihā janitā vṛtratūrasi tvaṃ tūrya taruṣyataḥ .. 311
analyzed: aśasti hā janitā vṛtratūrasi tvam tūrya taruṣyataḥ

original: 1 4 1 0210a pra yo ririkṣa ojasā divaḥ sadobhyaspari .
analyzed: pra yaḥ ririkṣe ojasā divaḥ sadobhyaḥ pari

original: 1 4 1 0210c na tvā vivyāca raja indra pārthivamati viśvaṃ vavakṣitha .. 312
analyzed: na tvā vivyāca rajaḥ indra pārthivam ati viśvam vavakṣitha  /

original: 1 4 1 0301c bodhāmasi tvā haryaśva yajñairbodhā na stomamandhaso madeṣu .. 313
analyzed: bodhāmasi tvā haryaśva yajñaiḥ bodha naḥ stomam andhasaḥ madeṣu

original: 1 4 1 0302a yoniṣṭa indra sadane akāri tamā nṛbhiḥ purūhūta pra yāhi .
analyzed: indra sadane akāri tamā nṛbhiḥ purūhūta pra yāhi

original: 1 4 1 0302c aso yathā no 'vitā vṛdhaściddado vasūni mamadaśca somaiḥ .. 314
analyzed: asaḥ yathā naḥ vitā vṛdhaḥ cit dadaḥ vasūni mamadaḥ ca somaiḥ

original: 1 4 1 0303c mahāntamindra parvataṃ vi yadvaḥ sṛjaddhārā ava yaddānavānhan .. 315
analyzed: mahantam indra parvatam vi yat vaḥ sṛjat hārāḥ ava yat dānavān han  /

original: 1 4 1 0304a suṣvāṇāsa indra stumasi tvā saniṣyantaścittuvinṛmṇa vājam .
analyzed: suṣvāṇāsaḥ indra stumasi tvā saniṣyantaḥ cittu vinṛmṇa vājam

original: 1 4 1 0304c ā no bhara suvitaṃ yasya konā tanā tmanā sahyāmā tvotāḥ .. 316
analyzed: ā naḥ bhara suvitam yasya konā tanā tmanā sahyāma tvotāḥ  /

original: 1 4 1 0305a jagṛhmā te dakṣiṇamindra hastaṃ vasūyavo vasupate vasūnām .
analyzed: jagṛhma te dakṣiṇam indra hastam vasūyavaḥ vasu pate vasūnām

original: 1 4 1 0305c vidmā hi tvā gopatiṃ śūra gonāmasmabhyaṃ citraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayindāḥ .. 317

original: 1 4 1 0306a indraṃ naro nemadhitā havanti yatpāryā yunajate dhiyastāḥ .
analyzed: indram naraḥ nemadhitā havanti yat pāryāḥ yunajate dhiyaḥ tāḥ

original: 1 4 1 0306c śūro nṛṣātā śravasaśca kāma ā gomati vraje bhajā tvaṃ naḥ .. 318
analyzed: śūraḥ nṛṣātā śravasaḥ ca kāmaḥ ā gomati vraje bhaja tvam naḥ  /

original: 1 4 1 0307a vayaḥ suparṇā upa sedurindraṃ priyamedhā ṛṣayo nādhamānāḥ .
analyzed: vayaḥ suparṇāḥ upa seduḥ indram priyamedhāḥ ṛṣayaḥ nādhamānāḥ
apa dhvāntam ūrṇuhi pūrdhi baddhān

original: 1 4 1 0308a nāke suparṇamupa yatpatantaṃ hṛdā venanto abhyacakṣata tvā .

original: 1 4 1 0308c hiraṇyapakṣaṃ varuṇasya dūtaṃ yamasya yonau śakunaṃ bhuraṇyum .. 320
analyzed: hiraṇya pakṣam varuṇasya dūtam yamasya yonau śakunam bhuraṇyum

original: 1 4 1 0309a brahma jajñānaṃ prathamaṃ purastādvi sīmataḥ suruco vena āvaḥ .

original: 1 4 1 0309c sa budhnyā upamā asya viṣṭhāḥ sataśca yonimasataśca vivaḥ .. 321
analyzed: sa budhnyāḥ upamāḥ asya viṣṭhāḥ sataḥ ca yonim asataḥ ca vivar

original: 1 4 1 0310a apūrvyā purutamānyasmai mahe vīrāya tavase turāya .
analyzed: apūrvyā purutamā anyasmai mahe vīrāya tavase turāya

original: 1 4 1 0310c virapśine vajriṇe śantamāni vacāṃsyāsmai sthavirāya takṣuḥ .. 322

original: 1 4 1 0401a ava drapso aṃśumatīmatiṣṭhadīyānaḥ kṛṣṇo daśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ .
analyzed: ava drapsaḥ aṃśumatīm atiṣṭhat īyānaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ daśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ

original: 1 4 1 0401c āvattamindraḥ śacyā dhamantamapa snīhitiṃ nṛmaṇā adhadrāḥ .. 323
analyzed: āvattam indraḥ śacyā dhamantam apa snīhitim nṛmaṇāḥ adhadrāḥ  /

original: 1 4 1 0402a vṛtrasya tvā śvasathādīṣamāṇā viśve devā ajahurye sakhāyaḥ .

original: 1 4 1 0402c marudbhirindra sakhyaṃ te astvathemā viśvāḥ pṛtanā jayāsi .. 324
analyzed: marudbhiḥ indra sakhyam te astu atha imāḥ viśvāḥ pṛtanāḥ jayāsi  /

original: 1 4 1 0403a vidhuṃ dadrāṇaṃ samane bahūnāṃ yuvānaṃ santaṃ palito jagāra .
analyzed: vidhum dadrāṇam samane bahūnām yuvānam santam palitaḥ jagāra

original: 1 4 1 0403c devasya paśya kāvyaṃ mahitvādyā mamāra sa hyaḥ samāna .. 325

original: 1 4 1 0404a tvaṃ ha tyatsaptabhyo jāyamāno 'śatrubhyo abhavaḥ śatrurindra .
analyzed: tvam ha tyad saptabhyaḥ jāyamānaḥ śatrubhyaḥ abhavaḥ śatruḥ indra

original: 1 4 1 0404c gūḍhe dyāvāpṛthivī anvavindo vibhumadbhyo bhuvanebhyo raṇaṃ dhāḥ .. 326
analyzed: gūḍhe dyāvāpṛthivī anvavindaḥ vibhumadbhyaḥ bhuvanebhyaḥ raṇam dhāḥ  /

original: 1 4 1 0405a meḍiṃ na tvā vajriṇaṃ bhṛṣṭimantaṃ purudhasmānaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ sthirapsnum .

original: 1 4 1 0406a pra vo mahe mahevṛdhe bharadhvaṃ pracetase pra sumatiṃ kṛṇudhvam .
analyzed: pra vaḥ mahe mahevṛdhe bharadhvam pracetase pra sumatim kṛṇudhvam

original: 1 4 1 0407c śṛṇvantamugramūtaye samatsu dhnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi sañjitaṃ dhanāni .. 329

original: 1 4 1 0408a udu brahmāṇyairata śravasyendraṃ samarye mahayā vasiṣṭha .

original: 1 4 1 0408c ā yo viśvāni śravasā tatānopaśrotā ma īvato vacāṃsi .. 330

cakram yat asya apsvā niṣattam uta u tat asmai madhu id cacchadyāt

original: 1 4 1 0501a tyamū ṣu vājinaṃ devajūtaṃ sahovānaṃ tarutāraṃ rathānām .
analyzed: tyamū su vājinam deva jūtam sahovānam tarutāram rathānām

original: 1 4 1 0502c huve nu śakraṃ puruhūtamindramidaṃ havirmaghavā vetvindraḥ .. 333
analyzed: huve nu śakram puru hūtam indram idam haviḥ maghavā vetu indraḥ

original: 1 4 1 0503a yajāmaha indraṃ vajradakṣiṇaṃ harīṇāṃ rathya3ṃ vivratānām .
analyzed: yajāmahe indram vajra dakṣiṇam harīṇām vivratānām

original: 1 4 1 0503c pra śmaśrubhirdodhuvadūrdhvadhā bhuvadvi senābhirbhayamāno vi rādhasā .. 334
analyzed: pra śmaśrubhiḥ dodhuvat ūrdhvadhā bhuvat vi senābhiḥ bhayamānaḥ vi rādhasā

original: 1 4 1 0504a satrāhaṇaṃ dādhṛṣiṃ tumramindraṃ mahāmapāraṃ vṛśabhaṃ suvajram .
analyzed: satrāhaṇam dādhṛṣim tumram indram mahām apāram vṛśabham su vajram

original: 1 4 1 0504c hantā yo vṛtraṃ sanitota vājaṃ dātā maghāni maghavā surādhāḥ .. 335
analyzed: hantā yaḥ vṛtram sanitā uta vājam dātā maghāni maghavā su rādhāḥ

original: 1 4 1 0505a yo no vanuṣyannabhidāti marta ugaṇā vā manyamānasturo vā .
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ vanuṣyan abhidāti martaḥ ugaṇā vā manyamānaḥ turaḥ vā

original: 1 4 1 0505c kṣidhī yudhā śavasā vā tamindrābhī ṣyāma vṛṣamaṇastvotāḥ .. 336
analyzed: kṣidhī yudhā śavasā vā tam indra abhī syāma vṛṣamaṇastva ūtāḥ

original: 1 4 1 0506a yaṃ vṛtreṣu kṣitaya spardhamānā yaṃ yukteṣu turayanto havante .
analyzed: yam vṛtreṣu kṣitayaḥ spardhamānāḥ yam yukteṣu turayantaḥ havante

original: 1 4 1 0506c yaṃ śūrasātau yamapāmupajmanyaṃ viprāso vājayante sa indraḥ .. 337
analyzed: yam śūrasātau yam apām upajmanyam viprāsaḥ vājayante saḥ indraḥ

original: 1 4 1 0507a indrāparvatā bṛhatā rathena vāmīriṣa ā vahataṃ suvīrāḥ .
analyzed: indrāparvatā bṛhatā rathena vāmīriṣaḥ ā vahatam su vīrāḥ

original: 1 4 1 0507c vītaṃ havyānyadhvareṣu devā vardhethāṃ gīrbhīriḍayā madantā .. 338
analyzed: vītam havyāni adhvareṣu devā vardhethām gīrbhīriḍayā madantā  /

original: 1 4 1 0508a indrāya giro aniśitasargā apaḥ prairayatsagarasya budhnāt .
analyzed: indrāya giraḥ aniśita sargāḥ apaḥ prairayat sagarasya budhnāt

original: 1 4 1 0508c yo akṣeṇeva cakriyau śacībhirviṣvaktastambha pṛthivīmuta dyām .. 339
analyzed: yaḥ akṣeṇa iva cakriyau śacībhiḥ viṣvakta stambha pṛthivīm uta dyām

original: 1 4 1 0509a ā tvā sakhāyaḥ sakhyā vavṛtyustiraḥ purū cidarṇavāṃ jagamyāḥ .
analyzed: ā tvā sakhāyaḥ sakhyā vavṛtyuḥ tiras purū cit arṇavām jagamyāḥ

original: 1 4 1 0509c piturnapātamā dadhita vedhā asminkṣaye pratarāṃ dīdyānaḥ .. 340
analyzed: piturnapātamāḥ dadhita vedhāḥ asmin kṣaye pratarām dīdyānaḥ  /

original: 1 4 1 0510a ko adya yuṅkte dhuri gā ṛtasya śimīvato bhāmino durhṛṇāyūn .
analyzed: kaḥ adya yuṅkte dhuri gāḥ ṛtasya śimīvataḥ bhāminaḥ durhṛṇāyūn
āsanneṣām apsuvāhaḥ mayobhūn yaḥ eṣām bhṛtyām ṛṇadhat sa jīvāt  /
caturtha prapāṭhakaḥ dvitīyaḥ ṛdhaḥ
gāyanti tvā gāyatriṇaḥ rcanti arkam arkiṇaḥ

indram viśvāḥ avīvṛdhan samudra vyacasam giraḥ
rathītamam rathīnām vājānām satpatim patim
imam indra sutam piba jyeṣṭham amartyam madam
śukrasya tvā abhyakṣarandhārāḥ ṛtasya sādane

original: 1 4 2 0604a yadindra citra ma iha nāsti tvādātamadrivaḥ .
analyzed: yat indra citra me iha na asti tvādātam adrivas
rādhaḥ tat naḥ vidadvaso ubhayāhastyā bhara

original: 1 4 2 0605a śrudī havaṃ tiraścyā indra yastvā saparyati .
analyzed: śrudi havam tiraścyāḥ indra yaḥ tvā saparyati
su vīryasya gomataḥ rāyaspūrdhi mahān asi

original: 1 4 2 0606a asāvi soma indra te śaviṣṭha dhṛṣṇavā gahi .
analyzed: asāvi somaḥ indra te śaviṣṭha dhṛṣṇavā gahi

original: 1 4 2 0606c ā tvā pṛṇaktvindriyaṃ rajaḥ sūryo na raśmibhiḥ .. 347
analyzed: ā tvā pṛṇaktu indriyam rajaḥ sūryaḥ na raśmibhiḥ
ā indra yāhi haribhiḥ upa kaṇvasya suṣṭutim

original: 1 4 2 0607c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso .. 348
analyzed: divaḥ amuṣya śāsataḥ divam yaya divāvaso

original: 1 4 2 0608a ā tvā giro rathīrivāsthuḥ suteṣu girvaṇaḥ .
analyzed: ā tvā giraḥ rathīḥ iva asthuḥ suteṣu girvaṇaḥ

original: 1 4 2 0608c abhi tvā samanūṣata gāvo vatsaṃ na dhenavaḥ .. 349
analyzed: abhi tvā samanūṣata gāvaḥ vatsam na dhenavaḥ

original: 1 4 2 0609a eto nvindraṃ stavāma śuddhaṃ śuddhena sāmnā .
analyzed: eta u nu indram stavāma śuddham śuddhena sāmnā
śuddhaiḥ ukthaiḥ vāvṛdhvāṃsam śuddhaiḥ āśīḥ vānmamattu

original: 1 4 2 0610a yo rayiṃ vo rayintamo yo dyumnairdyumnavattamaḥ .
analyzed: yaḥ rayim vaḥ rayintamaḥ yaḥ dyumnaiḥ dyumnavattamaḥ

original: 1 4 2 0610c somaḥ sutaḥ sa indra te 'sti svadhāpate madaḥ .. 351
analyzed: somaḥ sutaḥ saḥ indra te sti svadhā pate madaḥ

original: 1 4 2 0702a ā no vayovayaḥśayaṃ mahāntaṃ gahvareṣṭhāṃ mahāntaṃ pūrvineṣṭhām .
analyzed: ā naḥ vayaḥ vayaḥ śayam mahāntam gahvareṣṭhām mahāntam pūrvineṣṭhām
ugram vacaḥ apāvadhīḥ

original: 1 4 2 0703a ā tvā rathaṃ yathotaye sumnāya vartayāmasi .
analyzed: ā tvā ratham yathā ūtaye sumnāya vartayāmasi
tuvikūrmim ṛtīṣaham indram śaviṣṭha satpatim
sa pūrvyaḥ mahānām venaḥ kratubhiḥ ānaje

original: 1 4 2 0704c yasya dvārā manuḥ pitā deveṣu dhiya ānaje .. 355
analyzed: yasya dvārā manuḥ pitā deveṣu dhiyaḥ ānaje  /
R yadī vahanti āśavaḥ bhrājamānāḥ ratheṣvā

original: 1 4 2 0705c pibanto madiraṃ madhu tatra śravāṃsi kṛṇvate .. 356
analyzed: pibantaḥ madiram madhu tatra śravāṃsi kṛṇvate
tyam u vaḥ a prahaṇam gṛṇīṣe śavasaspatim
indram viśvāsāham naram śaciṣṭham viśva vedasam  /
dadhikrāvṇaḥ akāriṣam jiṣṇoḥ aśvasya vājinaḥ

analyzed: sutaḥ pavitram paryeti rebhan mitā iva sadma paśumanti hotā  /

original: 1 6 1 0405a somaḥ pavate janitā matīnāṃ janitā divo janitā pṛthivyāḥ .
analyzed: somaḥ pavate janitā matīnām janitā divaḥ janitā pṛthivyāḥ
janitā agneḥ janitā sūryasya janitā indrasya janitā uta viṣṇoḥ
abhi tri pṛṣṭham vṛṣaṇam vayaḥ dhām ā aṅga uṣiṇam avāvaśanta vāṇīḥ

original: 1 6 1 0406c vanā vasāno varuṇo na sindhūrvi ratnadhā dayate vāryāṇi .. 528
analyzed: vanā vasānaḥ varuṇaḥ na sindhu urvi ratna dhāḥ dayate vāryāṇi

original: 1 6 1 0407a akrāntsamudraḥ prathame vidharmaṃ janayanprajā bhuvanasya gopāḥ .
analyzed: akrān samudraḥ prathame vidharmam janayan prajāḥ bhuvanasya gopāḥ

original: 1 6 1 0407c vṛṣā pavitre adhi sāno avye bṛhatsomo vāvṛdhe svāno adriḥ .. 529
analyzed: vṛṣā pavitre adhi sāno avye bṛhat somaḥ vāvṛdhe svānaḥ adriḥ  /

original: 1 6 1 0408a kanikranti harirā sṛjyamānaḥ sīdanvanasya jaṭhare punānaḥ .
analyzed: kanikranti hariḥ ā sṛjyamānaḥ sīdan vanasya jaṭhare punānaḥ

original: 1 6 1 0408c nṛbhiryataḥ kṛṇute nirṇijaṃ gāmato matiṃ janayata svadhābhiḥ .. 530

original: 1 6 1 0409a eṣa sya te madhumāṃ indra somo vṛṣā vṛṣṇaḥ pari pavitre akṣāḥ .

original: 1 6 1 0409c sahasradāḥ śatadā bhūridāvā śaśvattamaṃ barhirā vājyasthāt .. 531

original: 1 6 1 0410a pavasva soma madhumāṃ ṛtāvāpo vasāno adhi sāno avye .

original: 1 6 1 0410c ava droṇāni ghṛtavanti roha madintamo matsara indrapānaḥ .. 532

original: 1 6 1 0501a pra senānīḥ śūro agre rathānāṃ gavyanneti harṣate asya senā .

original: 1 6 1 0501c bhadrānkṛṇvannindrahavāntsakhibhya ā somo vastrā rabhasāni datte .. 533

original: 1 6 1 0502c pavamāna pavase dhāma gonāṃ janayantsūryamapinvo arkaiḥ .. 534

original: 1 6 1 0503a pra gāyatābhyarcāma devāntsomaṃ hinota mahate dhanāya .

original: 1 6 1 0504a pra hinvāno janitā rodasyo ratho na vājaṃ saniṣannayāsīt .

original: 1 6 1 0504c indraṃ gacchannāyudhā saṃśiśāno viśvā vasu hastayorādadhānaḥ .. 536

original: 1 6 1 0505a takṣadyadī manaso venato vāgjyeṣṭhasya dharmaṃ dyukṣoranīke .
analyzed: takṣat yadī manasaḥ venāt vāc jyeṣṭhasya dharmam dyukṣoḥ anīke

original: 1 6 1 0505c ādīmāyanvaramā vāvaśānā juṣṭaṃ patiṃ kalaśe gāva indum .. 537

original: 1 6 1 0506a sākamukṣo marjayanta svasāro daśa dhīrasya dhītayo dhanutrīḥ .
analyzed: sākamukṣaḥ marjayanta svasāraḥ daśa dhīrasya dhītayaḥ dhanutrīḥ

original: 1 6 1 0506c hariḥ paryadravajjāḥ sūryasya droṇaṃ nanakṣe atyo na vājī .. 538
analyzed: hariḥ paryadravat jāḥ sūryasya droṇam nanakṣe atyaḥ na vājī  /

original: 1 6 1 0507a adhi yadasminvājinīva śubhaḥ spardhante dhiyaḥ sūre na viśaḥ .
analyzed: adhi yat asmin vājinī iva śubhaḥ spardhante dhiyaḥ sūre na viśaḥ

original: 1 6 1 0507c apo vṛṇānaḥ pavate kavīyanvrajaṃ na paśuvardhanāya manma .. 539
analyzed: apaḥ vṛṇānaḥ pavate kavīyan vrajam na paśu vardhanāya manma

original: 1 6 1 0508a indurvājī pavate gonyoghā indre somaḥ saha invanmadāya .
analyzed: induḥ vājī pavate gonyoghāḥ indre somaḥ sahaḥ invat madāya

original: 1 6 1 0508c hanti rakṣo bādhate paryarātiṃ varivaskṛṇvanvṛjanasya rājā .. 540
analyzed: hanti rakṣaḥ bādhate paryarātim varivaskṛṇvan vṛjanasya rājā

original: 1 6 1 0509a ayā pavā pavasvainā vasūni māṃścatva indro sarasi pra dhanva .
analyzed: ayā pavā pavasva enā vasūni māṃścatve indra u sarasi pra dhanva

original: 1 6 1 0509c braghnaścidyasya vāto na jūtiṃ purumedhāścittakave naraṃ dhāt .. 541
analyzed: braghnaḥ cit yasya vātaḥ na jūtim puru medhāḥ citta kave naram dhāt  /
mahat tat somaḥ mahiṣaḥ cakāra apām yat garbhaḥ vṛṇīta devān
adadhāt indre pavamānaḥ ojaḥ janayat sūrye jyotiḥ induḥ

original: 1 6 1 0511a asarji vakvā rathye yathājau dhiyā manotā prathamā manīṣa .
analyzed: asarji vakvā rathye yathā ājau dhiyā manotā prathamā manīṣa

original: 1 6 1 0511c daśa svasāro adhi sāno avye mṛjanti vahniṃ sadaneṣvaccha .. 543
analyzed: daśa svasāraḥ adhi sāno avye mṛjanti vahnim sadaneṣu accha

original: 1 6 1 0512c namasyantīrupa ca yanti saṃ cāca viśantyuśatīruśantam .. 544
analyzed: namasyantīḥ upa ca yanti sam ca ā ca viśanti uśatīḥ uśantam  /

purojitī vaḥ andhasaḥ sutāya mādayitnave
apa śvānam śnathiṣṭana sakhāyaḥ dīrghajihvyam

original: 1 6 2 0602a ayaṃ pūṣā rayirbhagaḥ somaḥ punāno arṣati .
analyzed: ayam pūṣā rayiḥ bhagaḥ somaḥ punānaḥ arṣati
patiḥ viśvasya bhūmanaḥ vyakhyat rodasī ubhe
sutāsaḥ madhumattamāḥ somāḥ indrāya mandinaḥ
pavitravantaḥ akṣaran devān gacchantu vaḥ madāḥ  /

mitrāḥ svānāḥ arepasaḥ svādhyaḥ svar vidaḥ
abhi naḥ vāja sātamam rayi marṣa śata spṛham
indo sahasrabharṇasam tuvi dyumnam vibhāsaham
abhi navante adruhaḥ priyam indrasya kāmyam

original: 1 6 2 0606c vatsaṃ na pūrva āyuni jātaṃ rihanti mātaraḥ .. 550
analyzed: vatsam na pūrve āyuni jātam rihanti mātaraḥ
ā haryatāya dhṛṣṇave dhanuṣṭanvanti pauṃsyam

original: 1 6 2 0607c śukrā vi yantyasurāya nirṇije vipāmagre mahīyuvaḥ .. 551
analyzed: śukrāḥ vi yanti asurāya nirṇije vipām agre mahīyuvaḥ  /

original: 1 6 2 0608a pari tyaṃ haryataṃ hariṃ babhruṃ punanti vāreṇa .

original: 1 6 2 0701a abhi priyāṇi pavate canohito nāmāni yahvo adhi yeṣu vardhate .

original: 1 6 2 0701c ā sūryasya bṛhato bṛhannadhi rathaṃ viṣvañcamaruhadvicakṣaṇaḥ .. 554
analyzed: ā sūryasya bṛhataḥ bṛhan adhi ratham viṣvañcam aruhat vicakṣaṇaḥ  /

original: 1 6 2 0702a acodaso no dhanvantvindavaḥ pra svānāso bṛhaddeveṣu harayaḥ .

original: 1 6 2 0702c vi cidaśnānā iṣayo arātayo 'ryo naḥ santu saniṣantu no dhiyaḥ .. 555

original: 1 6 2 0703a eṣa pra kośe madhumāṃ acikradadindrasya vajro vapuṣo vapuṣṭamaḥ .
analyzed: eṣa pra kośe madhumān acikradat indrasya vajraḥ vapuṣaḥ vapuṣṭamaḥ

original: 1 6 2 0703c abhyR^ī3tasya sudughā ghṛtaścuto vāśrā arṣanti payasā ca ghenavaḥ .. 556

original: 1 6 2 0704c marya iva yuvatibhiḥ samarṣati somaḥ kalaśe śatayāmanā pathā .. 557
analyzed: maryaḥ iva yuvatibhiḥ samarṣati somaḥ kalaśe śata yāmanā pathā  /

original: 1 6 2 0705a dhartā divaḥ pavate kṛtvyo raso dakṣo devānāmanumādyo nṛbhiḥ .
analyzed: dhartā divaḥ pavate kṛtvyaḥ rasaḥ dakṣaḥ devānām anumādyaḥ nṛbhiḥ

original: 1 6 2 0705c hariḥ sṛjāno atyo na satvabhirvṛthā pājāṃsi kṛṇuṣe nadīṣvā .. 558
analyzed: hariḥ sṛjānaḥ atyaḥ na satvabhiḥ vṛthā pājāṃsi kṛṇuṣe nadīṣvā  /

original: 1 6 2 0706a vṛṣā matīnāṃ pavate vicakṣaṇaḥ somo ahnāṃ pratarītoṣasāṃ divaḥ .
analyzed: vṛṣā matīnām pavate vicakṣaṇaḥ somaḥ ahnām pratarītā uṣasām divaḥ

original: 1 6 2 0707a trirasmai sapta dhenavo duduhrire satyāmāśiraṃ parame vyomani .

original: 1 6 2 0707c catvāryanyā bhuvanāni nirṇije cārūṇi cakre yadṛtairavardhata .. 560

original: 1 6 2 0708a indrāya soma suṣutaḥ pari sravāpāmīvā bhavatu rakṣasā saha .
analyzed: indrāya soma suṣutaḥ pari srava apa amīvā bhavatu rakṣasā saha

original: 1 6 2 0708c mā te rasasya matsata dvayāvino draviṇasvanta iha santvindavaḥ .. 561

original: 1 6 2 0709a asāvi somo aruṣo vṛṣā harī rājeva dasmo abhi gā acikradat .

original: 1 6 2 0710a pra devamacchā madhumanta indavo 'siṣyadanta gāva ā na dhenavaḥ .

original: 1 6 2 0711a añjate vyañjate samañjate kratuṃ rihanti maghvābhyañjate .

original: 1 6 2 0712a pavitraṃ te vitataṃ brahmaṇaspate prabhurgātrāṇi paryeṣi viśvataḥ .

original: 1 6 2 0712c ataptatanūrna tadāmo aśnute śṛtāsa idvahantaḥ saṃ tadāśata .. 565

original: 1 6 2 0801a indramaccha sutā ime vṛṣaṇaṃ yantu harayaḥ .

original: 1 6 2 0802a pra dhanvā soma jāgṛvirindrāyendo pari srava .

original: 1 6 2 0803a sakhāya ā ni ṣīdata punānāya pra gāyata .

viśvā pari priyā bhuvat adha dvitā

ā kalaśam madhumān soma naḥ sadaḥ  /

original: 1 6 2 0807a somaḥ punāna ūrmiṇāvyaṃ vāraṃ vi dhāvati .

original: 1 6 2 0812a pari kośaṃ madhuścutaṃ somaḥ punāno arṣati .

original: 1 6 2 0901a pavasva madhumattama indrāya soma kratuvittamo madaḥ .

original: 1 6 2 0902a abhi dyumnaṃ bṛhadyaśa iṣaspate didīhi deva devayum .

original: 2 0 0 0104a uduttamaṃ varuṇa pāśamasmadavādhamaṃ vi madhyamaṃ śrathāya .

original: 2 0 0 0104c athāditya vrate vayaṃ tavānāgaso aditaye syāma .. 589

original: 2 0 0 0105a tvayā vayaṃ pavamānena soma bhare kṛtaṃ vi cinuyāma śaśvat .

roca vid parisrava

original: 4 9 3 0202a balavijñāyaḥ sthaviraḥ pravīraḥ sahasvānvājī sahamāna ugraḥ .
analyzed: bala vijñāyaḥ sthaviraḥ pravīraḥ sahasvān vājī sahamānaḥ ugraḥ

original: 4 9 3 0202c abhivīro abhisatvā sahojā jaitramindra rathamā tiṣṭha govit .. 1853
analyzed: abhivīraḥ abhisatvā sahaḥ jāḥ jaitram indra rathamā tiṣṭha go vid
gotrabhidam go vidam vajra bāhum jayantam ajma pramṛṇantam ojasā

original: 4 9 3 0203c imaṃ sajātā anu vīrayadhvamindraṃ sakhāyo anu saṃ rabhadhvam .. 1854
analyzed: imam sajātāḥ anu vīrayadhvam indram sakhāyaḥ anu sam rabhadhvam  /

original: 4 9 3 0301a abhi gotrāṇi sahasā gāhamāno 'dayo vīraḥ śatamanyurindraḥ .
analyzed: abhi gotrāṇi sahasā gāhamānaḥ dayaḥ vīraḥ śatamanyuḥ indraḥ

original: 4 9 3 0301c duścyavanaḥ pṛtanāṣāḍayudhyo3 'smākaṃ senā avatu pra yutsu .. 1855
analyzed: duścyavanaḥ pṛtanāṣāh ayudhyaḥ smākam senāḥ avatu pra yutsu  /

original: 4 9 3 0302a indra āsāṃ netā bṛhaspatirdakṣiṇā yajñaḥ pura etu somaḥ .
analyzed: indraḥ āsām netā bṛhaspatiḥ dakṣiṇā yajñaḥ puras etu somaḥ
deva senānām abhibhañjatīnām jayantīnām marutaḥ yantu agram  /

original: 4 9 3 0303a indrasya vṛṣṇo varuṇasya rājña ādityānāṃ marutāṃ śardha ugram .
analyzed: indrasya vṛṣṇaḥ varuṇasya rājñaḥ ādityānām marutām śardhaḥ ugram
mahāmanasām bhuvanacyavānām ghoṣaḥ devānām jayatām udasthāt
ud harṣaya maghavan āyudhāni utsatvanām māmakānām manāṃsi
ud vṛtrahan vājinām vājināni udrathānām jayatām yantu ghoṣāḥ  /

original: 4 9 3 0402a asmākamindraḥ samṛteṣu dhvajeṣvasmākaṃ yā iṣavastā jayantu .
analyzed: asmākam indraḥ samṛteṣu dhvajeṣu asmākam yāḥ iṣavaḥ tāḥ jayantu

original: 4 9 3 0402c asmākaṃ vīrā uttare bhavantvasmāṃ u devā avatā haveṣu .. 1859
analyzed: naḥ vīrāḥ uttare bhavantu asmān u devāḥ avata haveṣu

original: 4 9 3 0403a asau yā senā marutaḥ pareṣāmabhyeti na ojasā spardhamānā .
analyzed: asau yā senā marutaḥ pareṣām abhyeti naḥ ojasā spardhamānā

original: 4 9 3 0403c tāṃ gūhata tamasāpavratena yathaiteṣāmanyo anyaṃ na jānāt .. 1860
analyzed: tām gūhata tamasā apavratena yathā eteṣām anyaḥ anyam na jānāt  /
amīṣām cittam pratilobhayantī gṛhāṇa aṅgāni apve parehi

original: 4 9 3 0501c abhi prehi nirdaha hṛtsu śokairandhenāmitrāstamasā sacantām .. 1861
analyzed: abhi prehi nirdaha hṛtsu śokaiḥ andhena amitrāḥ tamasā sacantām  /

original: 4 9 3 0502a pretā jayatā nara indro vaḥ śarma yacchatu .
analyzed: pra ita jayata naraḥ indraḥ vaḥ śarma yacchatu
ugrāḥ vaḥ santu bāhavaḥ na adhṛṣyāḥ yathā asatha
avasṛṣṭā parā pata śaravye brahma saṃśite

original: 4 9 3 0503c gacchāmitrānpra padyasva māmīṣāṃ kaṃ ca nocchiṣaḥ .. 1863
analyzed: gaccha amitrān pra padyasva mā amīṣām kam ca na ucchiṣaḥ
kaṅkāḥ suparṇāḥ anu yantu enān gṛdhrāṇām annam asau astu senā
mā eṣām mocī agha hāraḥ ca na indra vayāṃsi enān anusaṃyantu sarvān
amitra senām maghavan asmān śatruyatīm abhi
ubhau tām indra vṛtrahan agniḥ ca dahatam prati

original: 4 9 3 0603a yatra bāṇāḥ sampatanti kumārā viśikhā iva .
analyzed: yatra bāṇāḥ sampatanti kumārāḥ viśikhāḥ iva

original: 4 9 3 0603c tatrā no brahmaṇaspatiraditiḥ śarma yacchatu viśvāhā śarma yacchatu .. 1866
analyzed: tatra naḥ brahmaṇaspatiḥ aditiḥ śarma yacchatu viśvāhā śarma yacchatu

original: 4 9 3 0701a vi rakṣo vi mṛdho jahi vi vṛtrasya hanū ruja .
analyzed: vi rakṣaḥ vi mṛdhaḥ jahi vi vṛtrasya hanū ruja
vi manyum indra vṛtrahan amitrasya abhidāsataḥ

original: 4 9 3 0702a vi na indra mṛdho jahi nīcā yaccha pṛtanyataḥ .
analyzed: vi naḥ indra mṛdhaḥ jahi nīcā yaccha pṛtanyataḥ
yaḥ asmān abhidāsati adharam gamaya tamaḥ
indrasya bāhū sthavirau yuvānau anādhṛṣyau su pratīkau asahyau

original: 4 9 3 0703c tau yuñjīta prathamau yoga āgate yābhyāṃ jitamasurāṇāṃ saho mahat .. 1869
analyzed: tau yuñjīta prathamau yoge āgate yābhyām jitam asurāṇām sahaḥ mahat  /

original: 4 9 3 0801a marmāṇi te varmaṇā cchādayāmi somastvā rājāmṛtenānu vastām .
analyzed: marmāṇi te varmaṇā chādayāmi somaḥ tvā rājā amṛtena anu vastām

original: 4 9 3 0801c urorvarīyo varuṇaste kṛṇotu jayantaṃ tvānu devā madantu .. 1870
analyzed: uroḥ varīyaḥ varuṇaḥ te kṛṇotu jayantam tvā anu devāḥ madantu  /
andhāḥ amitrāḥ bhavata a śīrṣāṇaḥ hayaḥ iva
teṣām vaḥ agni nunnānām indraḥ hantu varaṃvaram

original: 4 9 3 0803a yo naḥ svo 'raṇo yaśca niṣṭyo jighāṃsati .
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ svaḥ raṇaḥ yaḥ ca niṣṭyaḥ jighāṃsati

original: 4 9 3 0803c devāstaṃ sarve dhūrvantu brahma varma mamāntaraṃ śarma varma mamāntaram .. 1872
analyzed: devāḥ tam sarve dhūrvantu brahma varma mama antaram śarma varma mama antaram

original: 4 9 3 0901a mṛgo na bhīmaḥ kucaro giriṣṭhāḥ parāvata ā jaganthā parasyāḥ .
analyzed: mṛgaḥ na bhīmaḥ kucaraḥ giriṣṭhāḥ parāvataḥ ā jagantha parasyāḥ

original: 4 9 3 0901c sṛkaṃ saṃśāya pavimindra tigmaṃ vi śatrūṃ tāḍhi vi mṛdho nudasva .. 1873
analyzed: sṛkam saṃśāya pavim indra tigmam vi śatrūm tāḍhi vi mṛdhaḥ nudasva  /

original: 4 9 3 0902a bhadraṃ karṇebhiḥ śṛṇuyāma devā bhadraṃ paśyemākṣabhiryajatrāḥ .
analyzed: bhadram karṇebhiḥ śṛṇuyāma devāḥ bhadram paśyema akṣabhiḥ yajatrāḥ
sthiraiḥ aṅgaiḥ tuṣṭuvām saḥ tanūbhiḥ vyaśemahi deva hitam yat āyuḥ

original: 4 9 3 0903a svasti na indro vṛddhaśravāḥ svasti naḥ pūṣā viśvavedāḥ .
analyzed: svasti naḥ indraḥ vṛddha śravāḥ svasti naḥ pūṣā viśva vedāḥ

original: 4 9 3 0903c svasti nastārkṣyo ariṣṭanemiḥ svasti no bṛhaspatirdadhātu ..
analyzed: svasti naḥ tārkṣyaḥ ariṣṭa nemiḥ svasti naḥ bṛhaspatiḥ dadhātu
om svasti naḥ bṛhaspatiḥ dadhātu
iti uttara ārcikaḥ
iti sāmaveda saṃhitā samāptā
